main event: An observer reported sighting a black object with a diameter of 5 ft and thickness of 3-5 ft, which passed only 5 ft above their car in Hanover, New Hampshire on September 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was round with a silvery underside,The observer described the object as dull black in color,The object appeared to be solid and made no noise,The sighting occurred at night with clear visibility conditions,Insufficient data was available for a conclusive evaluation.
sighted object: a black object with a silvery underside
witness description: the observer was driving their car when the object passed overhead
